channel.title: Rick van der Linden
channel.description: Recent content on Rick van der Linden

item.title: Airbnb Copenhagen
item.description: Source: www.ontheluce.com Introduction Copenhagen, the happiest city in the world, Who doesn’t want to go there! Happiness comes at a price though, you’ll need to find a place to stay. What better way to look for a place to stay than on AirBnB and us being students, would like to know what this will cost us. This is where the MAM program from LBS is already paying itself off.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: Aston_martin
item.description: Source: Autocarmalaysia.com Aston Martin My first contact with Aston Martin was as an intern at the merchandise department. Under CEO Dr. Andy Palmer, the company wanted to diversify their brand, to go from an automotive brand to a global luxury brand. When I came into the company the merchandise was being developed. I got the opportunity to develop the data infrastructure. Collecting, analysing and reporting of saels data was a big part of my internship.

item.title: Borisbikes
item.description: A new way to explore London In my first weeks in London I tried to see as much as possible from the city. Together with some newly found LBS friends, we made a plan of visiting as many places as we could before the program at LBS would start. Normally we would walk everywhere, but for the further places you will need public transport. We preferred to stay away from the crowded underground and busses because of the corona risk.

item.title: Charging_point_data
item.description: source: www.hoekwater.nl #Introduction Charging times are still one of the major downsides of owning and driving electric vehicles. It does not offer the same convenience as just filling up for petrol. Instead charging times can take hours before the vehicle is fully charged. I wanted to find out what the current charging behavior is and if there has been in a change in behavior over time. For this, I’m using experimental data from the UK government on charging events using OLEV-funded chargepoints.

item.title: IVA_Driebergen
item.description: Source: www.ivadriebergen.nl Automotive Business Management undergraduate. For my undergraduate I chose to do automotive business management at the IVA Driebergen in The Netherlands. The automotive focus, wide subject range and social skill development were the main reasons I went to this Business School. During my studies here I have been a treasurer at the student association, student ambassador and have volunteered to represent companies on fairs as sales representative.

item.title: LBS
item.description: source: www.london.edu My LBS adventure This page will feature some of my most memorable experiences at LBS reading for the Masters in anaytics and management.
